name: LuvEsence Body Mist,Forever Luv
description: A Fresh Fruity Floral Fragrance, where notes of Tangerine, Grapefruit, Pineapple, Strawberry and Passionfruit lead to a Heart of Jasmine, Muguet, Peony, Vanilla Orchid, and Red Berries, all resting on a Base of Woods and Musk.*Images for illustration purpose only. Products received may vary.
